title: Real-Estate Management SaaS Platform – Final Year Project for a real estate company (Inmobiliaria i3) (ONGOING)
description:
• Designed and developed a production-grade, multi-tenant web platform for end-to-end real estate management (owners, tenants, properties, payments, reporting). 
• Built a secure PDF processing engine (Multer + parsing) for automated payment validation from insurance statements with visual error highlighting and mismatch detection. 
• Implemented clean architecture, dependency injection, role-based access control (JWT), audit logging, and unit/integration tests. 
• Creating advanced reporting dashboards with dynamic filtering, inline editing, accordion details, and Excel/PDF export functionality. Source code confidential due to NDA – available to discuss architecture, challenges, and impact in detail during interviews.
link: NOT PUBLIC YET DUE TO NDA

title: Restaurant application app (Java)
description: Designed and developed a prototype app for a fictional restaurant, implementing core features like order reservations using Observer, State, and Facade among other design patterns, focusing on modularity, maintainability, and scalability of the application...

title: Personal Projects
description: Diverse types of projects (Game solver with AI, traffic signs recognition, etc), mostly revolving AI with Python, tensorflow and keras.
